skillTree.name: Blessing of the Volcano God
skillTree.description: Every army needs a warrior with a fire burning in their belly. Literally.

skillTree.name: Fire Within
skillTree.description: A sword of searing heat cuts through flesh as if tearing through a damp scroll.

ui_effects.description: Requires line of sight to the target

skillTree.name: Lookout Gnoblars
skillTree.description: Stumpy and short-witted as they are, these Gnoblars have an eye on the sky at all times.

skillTree.name: Immortality
skillTree.description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say noâ€¦

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.name: Mentor
skillTree.description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

ui_effects.description: Requires line of sight to the target
Requires line of sight to the target

skillTree.name: Earthing
skillTree.description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.

skillTree.name: Magical Reserves
skillTree.description: A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5

skillTree.name: Wanderer
skillTree.description: "Da Wanderer, they call 'im da Wanderer â€“ 'e roams around, around, around, around, around."

effects.description: Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 10%

skillTree.name: Firebrand
skillTree.description: Scorch the earth and set whole cities aflame â€“ the Fire Mouth will claim all in the infernal blaze.

effects.description: Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 2

skillTree.name: Incendiary
skillTree.description: Even walls cannot protect you from a fire that cannot be quenched.

effects.description: Damage Walls action: 2 additional wall breaches

skillTree.name: Destroyer
skillTree.description: Those who have gorged upon the magma of the Fire Mouth harness the very essence of its burning rage.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 10% chance of wounding target

skillTree.name: Magma Incarnate
skillTree.description: The best offence is a good defence. And the best form of defence is to belch an impenetrable wall of flame.

effects.description: Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -8%

skillTree.name: Scouting
skillTree.description: Spellcasters can oft-sense when magic is close or being drawn from the Winds.

effects.description: Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 5%
Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 10%
Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.name: Spread Control
skillTree.description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 1
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 2
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.name: Damage Walls
skillTree.description: They cannot stop what they cannot see.

effects.description: Damage Walls action: 1 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 2 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 3 additional wall breaches

skillTree.name: Wound
skillTree.description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 12% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 21% chance of wounding target

skillTree.name: Block Army
skillTree.description: To sow discord and confuse the enemy, sending them down the wrong route or befuddling their senses.

effects.description: Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -3%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -8%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -15%

skillTree.name: Specialist
skillTree.description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

backgroundSkills.name: Aggressive
backgroundSkills.description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.

backgroundSkills.name: Confident
backgroundSkills.description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +10% for units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Cunning
backgroundSkills.description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

effects.description: Greatly reduced chance of being detected while in ambush stance

backgroundSkills.name: Determined
backgroundSkills.description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.

backgroundSkills.name: Disciplined
backgroundSkills.description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.

backgroundSkills.name: Fleet-Footed
backgroundSkills.description: Being fleet of foot is useful in a fightâ€¦ or when trying to get away afterwards!

backgroundSkills.name: Intelligent
backgroundSkills.description: Sharp minds make sharp blades sharper still.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +5% chance of wounding aggressors

backgroundSkills.name: Knowledgeable
backgroundSkills.description: What this being doesn't know probably isn't worth knowing, so deep is their interest in the world and its ways.

backgroundSkills.name: Strategist
backgroundSkills.description: This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.

effects.description:
Casualty replenishment rate: +5%
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Strong
backgroundSkills.description: Well built, robust. Powerful.

backgroundSkills.name: Tactician
backgroundSkills.description: Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.

effects.description:
Missile strength: +10% for units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Tough
backgroundSkills.description: Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.

backgroundSkills.name: Weapon Master
backgroundSkills.description: If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.

backgroundSkills.name: Farter
backgroundSkills.description: Though they risk killing the Ogres directly behind them, those fighters who like it spicy can propel themselves further with gassy emanations following a hearty meal.

effects.description:
Leadership: -2 for enemy units
	(enemy armies in local region)

backgroundSkills.name: Flabby
backgroundSkills.description: The more meat you eat, the stronger and fatter you become, and therefore the harder you are to move from your chosen position.

backgroundSkills.name: Big Daddy
backgroundSkills.description: There may or may not be a height difference between this one and his Ogreish colleagues, but in stature on the battlefield the divergence is most stark.

backgroundSkills.name: Maw Preacher
backgroundSkills.description: "Remember, lads, when Great Maw came 'e ate the night, shook the ground and burnt it with fire. That is 'oo we serve, not sum uvver power."

ui_effects.description: Requires line of sight to the target

backgroundSkills.name: Flamesworn
backgroundSkills.description: Sworn to the flame, this Firebelly is eager to share it with his allies - imbuing them with fiery might.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Flaming Sword of Rhuin"
Winds of Magic cost: -4 for "Flaming Sword of Rhuin Upgraded"

backgroundSkills.name: Rageflame
backgroundSkills.description: Fanning the flames with his own fury, this Firebelly is a terrifyingly potent force on the battlefield, at the cost of his own body.

backgroundSkills.name: Consuming Flame
backgroundSkills.description: Ogres share the same hunger as the Flame, willing to sacrifice anything to sate that desire. Even knowing they may not survive the feeding, they press on.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "The Burning Head"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "The Burning Head Upgraded"

backgroundSkills.name: Burning Body
backgroundSkills.description: Searing heat and flickering flame surround this warrior in combat, consuming their foes.

ui_effects.description: Effect intensity increases with time spent engaged in melee.

backgroundSkills.name: Ogre Discipline
backgroundSkills.description: Keeping an army of unruly Ogres in line takes a few more beatings than some armies could stomach, but discipline is enforced nonetheless.

backgroundSkills.name: Rough Lads
backgroundSkills.description: A well-fed army of Ogres, their aggression encouraged at every step, is a terrifying foe on the battlefield.

backgroundSkills.name: Quick Lads
backgroundSkills.description: An Ogre charge is quite impressive, especially from an army of aggressive, and surprisingly quick, bulls.

backgroundSkills.name: Tough Lads
backgroundSkills.description: Extra gutplates and a bit of smithing is a welcome benefit to the bulls in this hero's army.

backgroundSkills.name: Shock and Awe
backgroundSkills.description: Devastating offensive power makes this hero a force to be reckoned with.

backgroundSkills.name: Brute
backgroundSkills.description: Tough, strong, and brutal; if ever there was an enforcer, this is it.

backgroundSkills.name: Ironbelly
backgroundSkills.description: Heavy metal gutplates ensure this bull is nearly impossible to take down, shrugging off most attacks.

backgroundSkills.name: Quick
backgroundSkills.description: A gigantic stride and a talent for motion make this big lad surprisingly quick.
